title: Soil Amendment Myths | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Identify appropriate soil amendments and practices for Wyoming gardens.
subtasks: Understand the limitations of gypsum as a soil conditioner.
Recognize the risks of overusing lime in Wyoming soils.
Promote the benefits of incorporating organic matter into the soil.
Encourage consulting local Extension educators for soil testing and advice.
